---
title: "MTSS Delivery Method Analysis"
author: "Dodji807"
date: "2026-02-19"
categories: [Data Visualization, Lab 7]
---

## Project Introduction

The goal of this project is to analyze the effectiveness of different educational interventions. Specifically, I am examining how various **delivery methods** impact the **Improvement Index** of students.

This analysis focuses on the **Multi-Tiered System of Supports (MTSS)** framework, comparing two primary strategies:

-   **Small-Group (Tiers 2 & 3):** Targeted support for students who need more intensive help.

-   **Whole-Class (Tier 1):** Universal instruction provided to all students in a classroom.

By visualizing these differences, I aim to determine which delivery method consistently yields higher average student growth.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
## Initial Project Visualization

#| label: fig-mtss
#| fig-cap: "Average Improvement Index by Delivery Method"
#| echo: true
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
# Ensure your CSV is in the 'data' folder of your project

df <- read_csv("Interventions_Studies_And_Findings_clean.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 13280 Columns: 285
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (28): i_Intervention_Name, i_Protocol, i_Outcome_Domain, i_Intervention...
dbl (226): ReviewID, i_InterventionID, i_Protocol_Version, i_NumStudiesMeeti...
lgl  (31): i_Demographics_Sample_International, i_Ethnicity_Not_Hispanic, i_...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
```

:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculate means 
mtss_data <- df %>% 
  summarise( 
    `Small-Group (Tiers 2 & 3)` = mean(f_Improvement_Index[s_Delivery_Method_Small_Group %in% 1], na.rm = TRUE), 
    `Whole-Class (Tier 1)` = mean(f_Improvement_Index[s_Delivery_Method_Whole_Class %in% 1], na.rm = TRUE) 
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "Method", values_to = "Avg_Improvement")

# Create the visualization
ggplot(mtss_data, aes(x = reorder(Method, Avg_Improvement), y = Avg_Improvement, fill = Method)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") + 
  geom_text(aes(label = round(Avg_Improvement, 2)), vjust = -0.5) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs( 
    title = "Average Improvement Index by Delivery Method", 
    x = "Delivery Method", 
    y = "Average Improvement Index" 
  ) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#1f77b4", "#ff7f0e")) + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
